verses.verse: Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%> that his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%> that his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Now let those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> that his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Out of my <S%H4712>distress,<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H3050>Yah.<s%> <S%H3050>Yah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me with <S%H4800>freedom.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is on my <S%H3372>side.<s%> I will not be afraid. What <S%H6213>can<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> do to <S%H6213>me?<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is on my side among those who <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H7200>me.<s%> Therefore I will look in triumph at those who hate <S%H8130>me.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H120>man.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> than to put <S%H982>confidence<s%> in <S%H5081>princes.<s%>
All the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H8034>me,<s%> but in the name of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I cut them <S%H4135>off.<s%>
They <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> <S%H5437>me,<s%> yes, they surrounded <S%H8034>me.<s%> In the name of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> I indeed cut them <S%H4135>off.<s%>

They <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me like <S%H1682>bees.<s%> They are <S%H1846>quenched<s%> like the <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H6975>thorns.<s%> In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> I cut them <S%H4135>off.<s%>
You <S%H1760>pushed<s%> me back <S%H1760>hard,<s%> to make me <S%H5307>fall,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> helped <S%H5826>me.<s%>
<S%H3050>Yah<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song.<s%> He has become my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>rejoicing<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> "The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7426>exalted!<s%> The right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly!<s%>"
I will not <S%H4191>die,<s%> but <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> <S%H3050>Yah<s%>'s <S%H4639>works.<s%>
<S%H3050>Yah<s%> has <S%H3256>punished<s%> me <S%H3256>severely,<s%> but he has not given me <S%H5414>over<s%> to <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> I will <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H3034>them.<s%> I will give thanks to <S%H3050>Yah.<s%>
This is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will enter into <S%H935>it.<s%>
I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H6030>you,<s%> for you have answered <S%H3444>me,<s%> and have become my salvation.
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> has become the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
This is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6381>doing.<s%> It is marvelous in our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
This is the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>made.<s%> We will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be glad in <S%H8055>it!<s%>
<S%H3467>Save<s%> us <S%H577>now,<s%> we beg <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> we <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H6743>you,<s%> send prosperity now.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is he who <S%H935>comes<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> We have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H410>God,<s%> and he has given us <S%H215>light.<s%> <S%H631>Bind<s%> the <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords,<s%> even to the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
You are my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H430>you.<s%> You are my God, I will exalt <S%H7311>you.<s%>
Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good,<s%> for his loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
